text: Seaweed's memory was prodigious; her manner must have been worth a great deal to the proprietors of the hotel. She greeted John, however, with less than her usual cordiality and flashed a warning glance at him. Evidently the other occupant of the bar was not persona grata. If her memory was good, so was this stranger's. "You're Commander Winter," he said. "Have a gin?" He turned to Seaweed.
